politica.title: Privacy Policy
politica.datos: At MBBQ we collect data such as your email to improve our services, send you news, and manage subscriptions. This collection is done under your explicit consent, complying with Colombian Law 1581 of 2012 and the European GDPR.
politica.uso: We use your data to personalize your experience, manage communications, and improve site performance. We do not share your data with third parties without your authorization, except when legally required.
politica.cookies: We use cookies to improve your navigation and analyze site traffic. You can manage them from our cookies notice. Analytical cookies are only activated with your consent.
politica.derechos: You can access, correct, or delete your data, as well as revoke your consent. You can also request data portability or file a complaint with a data protection authority. Write to us at info@MBBQ.com.
politica.seguridad: We protect your data through SSL encryption, secure authentication, and access controls. We regularly review our practices to ensure your security.
politica.contacto: If you have questions about this policy or the use of your data, you can write to us at info@MBBQ.com. We respond within a maximum of 15 business days.
